document.full_text: the party will probably wait in vain for a white knight - jeb bush, chris christie and paul ryan are the most oft-cited - to rescue the party's presidential prospects.
document.title: letter from washington: republicans wait for their champion
lines_and_colors: the party will probably wait in vain for a white knight - jeb bush, chris christie and paul ryan are the most oft-cited - to rescue the party's presidential prospects.
